divs: sighting detailswife and i were driving north into madill on hwy 70. we both saw a white\orange light flash across the sky to the ne. the object was falling toward the ground and had a tail that matched the color of the object. the tail was short. my wife and i both thoughtthe object looked like a plane falling from the sky. i felt it also matched video of the debris falling from the shuttle wreckage. the object did not appear to fall all the way to the ground. the light faded before it would have gone behind the trees and buildings in our line of sight.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Madill
There were no other sightings in Madill on or around December 16th 2009
Summary: Wife and I witnessed a white/orange object apparently falling from sky. Object resembled meteor but tail was short.
